data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bazhong, Sichuan, China to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bazhong, Sichuan, China

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Bazhong who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 797 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Please, teach the 797 believers in Bazhong, Sichuan, China how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Ergong people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Ergong people.
Please, convict the 797 believers in Bazhong, Sichuan, China to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Bazhong to agree with you and with one another.
Jesus, make the 170 people in the county of Bazhong who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

location.name: Bazhong
location.people_groups_list: Namuyi, Naxi, Ga Mong, Nosu, Mangbu, Mulao Jia
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Namuyi (8,900), Naxi (341,000), Ga Mong (72,000), Nosu, Mangbu (87,000), Mulao Jia (41,000)
